plurals.name: battery_authentic_failed_message
plurals.item: Looks like battery disconnected. Your device will be powered off within %d seconds. Contact customer support to solve this issue.
Looks like battery disconnected. Your device will be powered off within %d second. Contact customer support to solve this issue.

plurals.name: tethered_notification_multi_device_message
plurals.item: %1$s devices are connected. Your device might heat up and consume more power.
%1$s device is connected. Your device might heat up and consume more power.
